messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/22/02 1:48:18 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... One of my fav. lines in MIB,  Elvis didn t die he just went home .  LOL Pam G. [Non-text
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/22/02 1:48:18 PM Eastern Standard Time,
mummyone24@... writes:

> Hey!!! Don't make fun of Elvis!! I LOVE Elvis. In fact I'm looking at him
> right now on my calender. I also have a doll of him in my room. The kids
> want to play with him from time to time, but NO ONE touches my Elvis
> doll!!!!
>
> Mary B (long live the king)
>
>
>

One of my fav. lines in MIB, "Elvis didn't die he just went home". LOL
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
